wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Campbell (6 September 1892 – 28 April 1971) was a Scottish footballer, who played as a goalkeeper for Liverpool, Partick Thistle, New Brighton, Stoke City and Leicester City. Campbell also played in eight full international matches for Scotland between 1920 and 1922.

response: *Ken Campbell (1941–2008), English writer, actor, director and comedian
*Ken Campbell (American football) (born 1938), end for Titans of New York
*Ken Campbell (evangelist) (1934–2006), Canadian fundamentalist Baptist and politician
